Name: Mini Z Racers Turbo
About the game: Engage in a fantastic mini race in unexpected places. Choose your favorite ZRacer and fight your way through 16 tracks in 4 awesome worlds. Grab ZBags and unleash power-ups on your foes! Be in the podium to earn Zcoins and improve your racer with several new equipment! Master 3 different game modes and explore levels to discover the full history of each racer. - Deal with Meatballs! - Scape from dirty rats! - Slide trough wet marble! - Fight giant AntZ! - Much more! FEATURES: - Classic top down gameplay blending micromachines and mario kart! - Intuitive Gameplay - 16 creative tracks - 10 awesome ZDrivers with history and individual endings - 13 unique powerups! - 18 items to improve your Zkart! - 10 Trophies
